title: Applying Instructional Design Principles to Improve Print Quality Management Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment incorporating instructional design principles and e-learning tools to enhance the effectiveness of existing print quality control training, considering accessibility in environments where most learners only have smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can identify print quality control standard metrics with 80% accuracy
Learners achieve over 85% goal attainment using learning content based on instructional design principles
Learners can explain complex quality control processes with 90% comprehension through integration of mobile apps and offline practice materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
